Articles.Content:
The test mission for the Kerbal Space Agency (KSA). The Endeavor is the first manned mission planned for a trip to Duna and back to Kerbin. Piloted by Jeb, Bill, and Bob, Endeavor is planned to arrive at Duna in one to three years. So far, the Endeavor has reached phase one of the mission, and is awaiting the trajectory burn to Duna. From there, any adjustments will be made within a few hours of the encounter. Then, the Endeavor will burn into orbit, drop the landing vehicle, from where the landing craft will land, burn into orbit, and rendezvous with the Endeavor, and will begin phase two of the mission. Endeavor will ditch the landing vehicle, burn out of orbit, do a trajectory adjustment, and return to Kerbin from there on.

Beginning of Phase One:
